# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value and relevance to you, worth $1500000 to you personally. We are offering this exceptional piece at a special introductory price of $1200000, a significant discount that reflects our confidence in its unmatched quality and your appreciation for it. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly remarkable. Please let us know if you wish to proceed with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
